feed.title: GitHub CMake Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of CMake in GitHub

entry.title: aminosbh/sdl2-pointerless
entry.summary: Use this one-file project/lib to create an SDL2 project/game WITHOUT any pointer specific knowledge.

entry.title: aminosbh/sdl2-cmake-modules
entry.summary: Modern CMake modules for finding and using the SDL2 library as well as other related libraries: SDL2_image, SDL2_ttf, SDL2_net, SDL2_mixer and SDL2_gfx. (Targets: SDL2::Core, SDL2::Main, SDL2::Image, SDL2::TTF, SDL2::Net, SDL2::Mixer and SDL2::GFX). Mirror of https://gitlab.com/aminosbh/sdl2-cmake-modules
